'read' : 'unread');\n+ // Return the widget without appending it to the DOM\n+ return widget;","path":"frontend/script.js","commit_id":"4dc24c60695241e175e6f0952ff270e2c0c310c4","original_commit_id":"4dc24c60695241e175e6f0952ff270e2c0c310c4","user":{"login":"gemini-code-assist[bot]","id":176961590,"node_id":"BOT_kgDOCow4Ng","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/in/956858?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D","html_url":"https://github.com/apps/gemini-code-assist","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/received_events","type":"Bot","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"![critical](https://www.gstatic.com/codereviewagent/critical.svg)\n\nDuring the refactoring of `renderFeedWidget` into `createFeedWidget`, the logic for rendering the list of feed items was accidentally removed from the function. This will cause all feed widgets to appear empty, without any articles. The item rendering code seems to have been left as dead code outside of any function.\n\n```javascript\n // Render items\n if (feed.items && feed.items.length > 0) {\n feed.items.forEach(item => {\n const listItem = document.createElement('li');\n listItem.dataset.itemId = item.id;\n listItem.classList.add(item.is_read ? 'read' : 'unread');\n\n const link = document.createElement('a');\n link.href = item.link;\n link.textContent = item.title;\n link.target = '_blank';\n link.addEventListener('click', () => handleMarkItemRead(item.id, listItem, feed.id, feed.tab_id));\n listItem.appendChild(link);\n\n const timestamp = document.createElement('span');\n timestamp.textContent = formatDate(item.published_time || item.fetched_time);\n listItem.appendChild(timestamp);\n\n itemList.appendChild(listItem);\n });\n } else {\n itemList.innerHTML = '
  • No items found for this feed.
    • ';\n }\n\n // Return the widget without appending it to the DOM\n return widget;\n```","created_at":"2025-10-06T22:06:18Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T22:06:18Z","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/92#discussion_r2408811725","pull_request_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/92","author_association":"CONTRIBUTOR","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408811725"},"html":{"href":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/92#discussion_r2408811725"},"pull_request":{"href":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/92"}},"reactions":{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408811725/reactions","total_count":0,"+1":0,"-1":0,"laugh":0,"hooray":0,"confused":0,"heart":0,"rocket":0,"eyes":0},"start_line":408,"original_start_line":408,"start_side":"RIGHT","line":409,"original_line":409,"side":"RIGHT","original_position":76,"position":76,"subject_type":"line"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408811734","pull_request_review_id":3307658540,"id":2408811734,"node_id":"PRRC_kwDOOcuOYs6Pk4zW","diff_hunk":"@@ -74,6 +75,9 @@ def announce(self, msg):\n \n # Initialize Flask application\n app = Flask(__name__)\n+# Configure CORS with specific allow Content truncated. Call the fetch tool with a start_index of 5000 to get more content.", "annotations": null}], "isError": false}
